content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Well, Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. To be honest, I'm looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment, so I'm open to discussing the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.

I want to negotiate the rental price with you.

I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.

I don't want to continue the negotiation. TERMINATE.

I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I see. Well, Juan, I appreciate your interest in renting the apartment. However, I must say that I'm not willing to accept the rental price of 800 Euros per month. That's just too low for me to consider. I'm looking for something closer to 1200 Euros per month. Would you be willing to negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month.

I want to negotiate the rental price with you.

I agree to the price of 1200 Euros per month.

I don't want to continue the negotiation. TERMINATE.

I agree to the price of 1050 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I see. Well, Juan, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, 1100 Euros per month is still not quite what I'm looking for. I'm looking for something closer to 1400 Euros per month. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Heinrich Heine
